style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;spacingTop=8;spacingLeft=2;spacingRight=12;shape=cube;size=10;direction=south;fontStyle=4;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=12" parent="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-24" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="280" height="244.99999999999997" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-20" value="<pre style="font-size: 10px;"><font style="font-size: 10px;" face="Courier New"><b>Payload JSON<br></b><br></font></pre><pre style="font-size: 10px;"><font style="font-size: 10px;" face="Courier New">{<br> "email": "user@mirante.example",</font></pre><pre style="font-size: 10px;"><font style="font-size: 10px;" face="Courier New"> "name": "Sônia Guimarães",</font></pre><pre style="font-size: 10px;"><font style="font-size: 10px;" face="Courier New"> "city": "São José dos Campos",</font></pre><pre style=""><font style="" face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 10px;"> "occupation": "Professora de Física"<br>}</span></font></pre>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=5;spacing=0;spacingTop=-10;" parent="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-24" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-42" value="" style="group" parent="1" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="420" y="-1590" width="280" height="250" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-48" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;dashed=1;dashPattern=1 source="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-38" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="140" y="420.4" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="140" y="337" /> <mxPoint x="141" y="337" /> <mxPoint x="141" y="420" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-38" value="Requisição&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">HTTP</span>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;spacingTop=8;spacingLeft=2;spacingRight=12;shape=cube;size=10;direction=south;fontStyle=4;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=12" parent="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-42" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry width="280" height="250" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-39" value="<pre style="font-size: 10px;"><font face="Courier New" style="font-size: 10px;"><b>Payload JSON</b></font></pre><pre style="font-size: 10px;"><font face="Courier New" style="font-size: 10px;"><b><br></b>{<br> "email": "rgpet@mirante.jutty.dev",</font></pre><pre style=""><font face="Courier New" style="font-size: 10px;"> "password": "</font><font face="Courier New"><span style="font-size: 10px;">nZmZm8Bg</span></font><span style="background-color: initial; font-family: Helvetica; white-space: normal; font-size: 10px;">"</span></pre><pre style="font-size: 10px;"><font face="Courier New" style="font-size: 10px;">}</font></pre>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=5;horizontal=1;" parent="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-42" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="11.25" y="90" width="237.5" height="130" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-41" value="<div style="font-size: 11px;"><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 11px;"><b style="font-size: 11px;">Rota HTTP</b></span></div><div style=""><font style="font-size: 10px;" face="Courier New">https://mirante.example/rpc/login</font><br style="font-size: 11px;"></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;spacingLeft=5;fontSize=11;align=left;" parent="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-42" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="40" width="240" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-47" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;dashed=1;dashPattern=1 3;strokeColor=default;strokeWidth=2;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=default;endArrow=none;" parent="1" source="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-45" target="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-38" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-45" value="Dada uma conta pré-definida especialmente para a integração, o sistema cliente pode obter um token de autenticação na rota <font face="Courier New">/rpc/login</font><div><font face="Helvetica">passando seu login e senha no corpo da requisição HTTP dentro de uma estrutura JSON.</font></div>" style="shape=note2;boundedLbl=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;size=25;verticalAlign=top;align=center;spacing=6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="769" y="-1547.5" width="226" height="165" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-49" value="As requisições seguem uma estrutura acordada através da documentação associada, distribuída junto do código fonte do servidor, através de um repositório público de código:<div><br></div><div><a href="https://github.com/jultty/mirante">https://github.com/jultty/mirante</a><br></div>" style="shape=note2;boundedLbl=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;size=25;verticalAlign=top;align=center;spacing=6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="147" y="-1525" width="203" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-16" value="A rota <font face="Courier New">/rpc/rgpet</font> recebe requisições HTTP com<div>&nbsp;o token no cabeçalho <font face="Courier New">Authorization</font> contendo&nbsp;</div><div>a palavra "<font face="Courier New">Bearer</font>" seguida do token.<div><br></div><div>O endereço de email é passado no campo "email" de uma estrutura JSON incluída no corpo da requisição.</div></div>" style="shape=note2;boundedLbl=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;size=25;verticalAlign=top;align=center;spacing=5;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="457" y="-945" width="290" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-53" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0;entryDx=122.5;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;dashed=1;dashPattern=1 3;strokeColor=default;strokeWidth=2;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;fontFamily=Helvetica;fontSize=11;fontColor=default;labelBackgroundColor=default;endArrow=none;" parent="1" source="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-16" target="39150e848f15840c-3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="39150e848f15840c-3" value="Requisição&nbsp;<span style="background-color: initial;">HTTP</span>" style="verticalAlign=top;align=left;spacingTop=8;spacingLeft=2;spacingRight=12;shape=cube;size=10;direction=south;fontStyle=4;html=1;rounded=0;shadow=0;comic=0;labelBackgroundColor=none;strokeWidth=1;fontFamily=Verdana;fontSize=12" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="106" y="-988" width="292" height="255" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-1" value="<pre style="font-size: 10px;"><font face="Courier New" style="font-size: 10px;"><b>Payload JSON</b></font></pre><pre style="font-size: 10px;"><font face="Courier New" style="font-size: 10px;"><b><br></b>{<br> "user_email": "user@mirante.example"<br>}</font></pre>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;spacingLeft=5;horizontal=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="121" y="-837.5" width="252" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-2" value="<div style="font-size: 11px;"><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 11px;"><b style="font-size: 11px;">Cabeçalho HTTP</b></span></div><div style="font-size: 11px;"><font style="font-size: 11px;" face="Courier New">Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGci...</font><br style="font-size: 11px;"></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;spacingLeft=5;fontSize=11;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="121" y="-890" width="252" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-3" value="<div style="font-size: 11px;"><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 11px;"><b style="font-size: 11px;">Rota HTTP</b></span></div><div style=""><font style="font-size: 10px;" face="Courier New">https://mirante.example/rpc/rg</font><span style="font-size: 10px; font-family: &quot;Courier New&quot;; background-color: initial;">pet</span></div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=0;spacingLeft=5;fontSize=11;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="121" y="-945" width="252" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-55" value="3" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="442" y="-955" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-57" value="1" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="132" y="-1535" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-58" value="2" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="762" y="-1555" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-26" value="Como resposta, o servidor retorna os dados associados ao endereço de email informado se o token for válido." style="shape=note2;boundedLbl=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;size=25;verticalAlign=top;align=center;spacing=6;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="472" y="-745" width="230" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="HVJFydFJnrmLToO-Zjqk-56" value="4" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="462" y="-755" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MUGKrScb9LSPxbiaW4VK-1" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=halfCircle;endFill=0;exitX=0.129;exitY=0.504;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="39150e848f15840c-5" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="320" y="-1160" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint x="230" y="-1105" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MUGKrScb9LSPxbiaW4VK-7" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=halfCircle;endFill=0;startSize=14;endSize=6;exitX=0.997;exitY=0.512;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="1" source="39150e848f15840c-7" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="832" y="-1075.25" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint x="792" y="-1075.25" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="MUGKrScb9LSPxbiaW4VK-8" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;endArrow=oval;endFill=0;endSize=14;exitX=0;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="39150e848f15840c-8" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="842" y="-1075.25" as="targetPoint" /> <mxPoint x="872" y="-1075.25" as="sourcePoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

span.style: background-color: initial; font-family: Helvetica; white-space: normal; font-size: 10px;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 233px; height: 1px; padding-top: 120px; margin-left: 391px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
font-size: 11px;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 216px; height: 1px; padding-top: 139px; margin-left: 728px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Dada uma conta pré-definida especialmente para a integração, o sistema cliente pode obter um token de autenticação na rota /rpc/login
passando seu login e senha no corpo da requisição HTTP dentro de uma estrutura JSON.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 193px; height: 1px; padding-top: 161px; margin-left: 106px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
As requisições seguem uma estrutura acordada através da documentação associada, distribuída junto do código fonte do servidor, através de um repositório público de código:
https://github.com/jultty/mirante

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 282px; height: 1px; padding-top: 740px; margin-left: 415px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
A rota /rpc/rgpet recebe requisições HTTP com
o token no cabeçalho Authorization contendo
a palavra "Bearer" seguida do token.
O endereço de email é passado no campo "email" de uma estrutura JSON incluída no corpo da requisição.

switch.text: A rota /rpc/rgpet recebe requisições HTTP com...

div.div: Como resposta, o servidor retorna os dados associados ao endereço de email informado se o token for válido.

switch.text: Como resposta, o servidor retorna os...
